name: Pump Go
description: Your essential companion for designing and analyzing centrifugal pump systems—quick calculations, dynamic head, pump power and intuitive workflow.

name: Pipe Sizing
description: Intuitive utility for engineers, technicians and students to calculate optimal pipe dimensions from flow, volume, density, time or rate.

name: Vapour Pressures
description: Application designed to calculate vapor pressures and boiling points with two large databases and extensive unit support.

name: Regression Analysis
description: Tool for performing simple linear or exponential regression exercises—ideal for students or professionals needing quick insight.

name: Gas Laws by CA
description: Intuitive and powerful utility to solve gas law equations (ideal & real), includes glossary and reference table of the universal gas constant R in multiple units.

name: Interpolation Methods
description: Performs linear and bilinear interpolation calculations—versatile for engineering, science and academic use.

name: Refrigerant Tables
description: Professional app that calculates refrigerants’ thermodynamic properties—inputs include temperature, pressure or volume; results include enthalpy, entropy, density and more.

name: Steam Tables by CA
description: Calculate thermodynamic properties of water and steam with flexible inputs, quality control and multiple engineering units.

name: Soap Making Workshop
description: Professional toolkit for handmade soap production and management—including recipes, batches, inventory, sales and iCloud sync.
